Journals 學術期刊:

嚴重急性呼吸系統綜合症(SARS)冠狀病毒 的ORF8蛋白質 來自大馬蹄蝠/大菊头蝠 通過基因重組

2015 Aug 12 Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) Coronavirus ORF8 Protein Is Acquired from SARS-Related Coronavirus from Greater Horseshoe Bats through Recombination

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4580176/



一種新的SARS樣冠狀病毒(在中國的蝙蝠裡面) 的基因組特徵及传染性

2018 Sep 12 Genomic characterization and infectivity of a novel SARS-like coronavirus in Chinese bats

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6135831/



BLAST

MN908947.3  (武漢海產市場肺炎病毒(Wuhan-Hu-1)的編號)

More dissimilar sequences (discontiguous megablast)  (BLAST的一個选项)

[url=https://pincong.rocks/url/img/aHR0cHM6Ly9pLmltZ3VyLmNvbS95cDlqa0RnLnBuZw][/url]



或許  ZXC21 或 ZC45 ( China在2018年研究的) 是 武漢海產市場肺炎病毒 的祖先

Maybe ZXC21 or ZC45 , China studied in 2018, is the parent of Wuhan seafood market pneumonia virus.



virus 病毒

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=khan+academy+virus&pbjreload=10
immune system   免疫系統
https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=khan+academy+immune&page=&utm_source=opensearch

Evolution of viruses 病毒進化
病毒經歷進化和自然选择 ,  而且進化迅速
Viruses undergo evolution and natural selection, just like cell-based life, and most of them evolve rapidly.

2病毒感染細胞後能混合複製, 生成有特有特性的混合病毒. 比如, 流感病毒株产生于此.
When two viruses infect a cell at the same time, they may swap genetic material to make new, "mixed" viruses with unique properties. For example, flu strains can arise this way.

RNA 病毒進化更快
RNA viruses have high mutation rates that allow especially fast evolution. An example is the evolution of drug resistance in HIV. 

Coronavirus 冠狀病毒 is（+）ssRNA virus 正义单链RNA病毒
